sentences: Michael Johnston (born October 15, 1976) is an American drummer.
He currently runs the educational website Mikeslessons.com, where he offers live and pre-recorded drum lessons.
He spent the next fifteen years studying privately with drummers Pete Magadini, Steve Ferrone, and Will Kennedy.
At the age of 21 he received his first major label record deal with his band Simon Says and spent the next five years touring the world.
